cirugia-plastica-facial.title: Discover how we can help you take care of your body and your health.
cirugia-plastica-facial.titleSpan: At MedTrip we take care of everything!
cirugia-plastica-facial.content: Get your evaluation to identify existing health problems and develop a treatment plan appropriate to the needs of your body.

cirugia-plastica-corporal.title: Discover how we can help you take care of your body and your health.
cirugia-plastica-corporal.titleSpan: At MedTrip we take care of everything!
cirugia-plastica-corporal.content: Obtén tu evaluación para identificar los problemas de salud existentes y desarrollar un plan de tratamiento adecuado a la necesidad de tu cuerpo.
